description: This file defines a custom React hook 'useTasks' for managing CRUD operations on 'tasks' stored in a Supabase database. It provides functions to fetch, create, update, and delete tasks, filtered optionally by user ID and date.

methods.name: useTasks(userId = null)
methods.description: Main hook function providing task CRUD operations, optionally filtering by user ID.

methods.name: getTasks
methods.description: Fetches tasks from the database, filtered by optional parameters such as user ID and date.

methods.name: createTask
methods.description: Creates a new task entry in the database for the specified or current user.

methods.name: updateTask
methods.description: Updates an existing task, ensuring only owner can modify it.

methods.name: deleteTask
methods.description: Deletes a task, only if performed by the task owner.
